Class EmoticonFragment.EmoticonCategoryViewpagerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object

  • Enclosing class:
    EmoticonFragment

    private class EmoticonFragment.EmoticonCategoryViewpagerAdapter
extends FragmentStatePagerAdapter
    An adapter class to bind the view pager with EmoticonGridFragment to display the grid of Emoticon for given category.
    See Also:
    FragmentStatePagerAdapter
